participant_1.background:
My family is very supportive and encouraging
i love to gossip.
I don't have enough hours in the day to do all the things I love.
i drive a yellow convertible in the rain.
my favorite movie is titanic.

participant_2.background:
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
I like the weather when it's warm enough to walk on the beach, but not so warm that I get too hot.
I am passionate and determined, even when faced with difficulties.
I am a self-motivated and reliable worker who is looking for a position where I can use my skills and experience to make a positive impact on the company.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing good too. I'm just hanging out, watching Titanic.
Oh, I love that movie! I've seen it a few times.
Me too! It's so good. What's your favorite part?
I think my favorite part is when Jack and Rose are on the raft. It's so romantic.
Yes, that is a great part. I also love the scene when Jack paints Rose.
That's a beautiful scene. Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet were so good in that movie.
I agree! They were perfect for their roles.
I'm glad you like the movie. It's one of my favorites.
Me too. I'm glad we got to chat about it.
Me too. It was nice talking to you.
You too. Have a good day!
